title: Smart Data Models - AccumulatorLimit
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Limit values for Accumulator measurements.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be AccumulatorLimit

LimitSet.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The limit values used for supervision of Measurements. Default: None

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value to supervise against. The value is positive. Default: 0
